articles.author: Philip Crilly
articles.title: Matthew Perry died of 'acute effects of ketamine' – what you need to know about the drug - The Conversation
articles.description: Perry was being legally prescribed infusions of ketamine.
articles.content: Millions of people worldwide were left devastated by the death this year of 54-year-old Matthew Perry, the Friends star famous for bringing wise-cracking Chandler Bing to life. A global superstar, re… [+3595 chars]
